name: Vodka Pong
description:
Don't drink too much, risking your head gonna explode.  Ok, not really but safety first. 

Vodka pong is just classic pong game with essence of vodka.
You can also play solo to try get high score or local player vs player. Gameplay is slightly different, ball in this case (drunk man) being randomly bounced to 8 directions , so no "physics" there.
Whatever. The real question is, why is that man drunk and probably naked (I can't see very well).

  • [←  or →] menu navigation | player 1 controll
  • [A or D] player 2 controll
  • [Spacebar] action button
